Dinner in the Parisian hotel is three set menus of three courses. Hotel Isboa also offers a fabulous buffet breakfast and a choice of two breakfast menus. Gold Hotel serves a buffet lunch and there is a choice of menu for dinner. Silver Hotel offers a buffet dinner and lunch with a choice of menu. Grey Silver Hotel serves a buffet supper and a choice of menu.
lunch in silver white hotel is a menu of three courses
